channel.title: CVE Feed for appleple inc. -- a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for appleple inc. -- a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series

item.title: CVE-2024-27279|2024-08-02T00:27:59.741Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series Ver.3.1.9 and earlier, Ver.3.0.x series Ver.3.0.30 and earlier, Ver.2.11.x series Ver.2.11.59 and earlier, Ver.2.10.x series Ver.2.10.51 and earlier, and Ver.2.9 and earlier versions. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with editor or higher privilege who can login to the product may obtain arbitrary files on the server including password files.

item.title: CVE-2024-31396|2024-07-23T20:44:24.938Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Code injection vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12 and Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with an administrator or higher privilege who can log in to the product may execute an arbitrary command on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-31396|2024-05-22T04:35:42.765Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Code injection vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12 and Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with an administrator or higher privilege who can log in to the product may execute an arbitrary command on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-31394|2024-06-04T17:37:08.083Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12, Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32, Ver.2.11.x series versions prior to Ver.2.11.61, Ver.2.10.x series versions prior to Ver.2.10.53, and Ver.2.9 and earlier versions. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with an editor or higher privilege who can log in to the product may obtain arbitrary files on the server.

item.title: CVE-2024-31395|2024-06-04T17:37:21.625Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12, Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32, Ver.2.11.x series versions prior to Ver.2.11.61, Ver.2.10.x series versions prior to Ver.2.10.53, and Ver.2.9 and earlier versions. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with an editor or higher privilege who can log in to the product may execute an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who accessed the schedule management page.

item.title: CVE-2024-30420|2024-05-22T04:35:26.240Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12 and Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with an administrator or higher privilege who can log in to the product may obtain arbitrary files on the server and information on the internal server that is not disclosed to the public.

item.title: CVE-2024-30419|2024-06-06T16:16:04.625Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series versions prior to Ver.3.1.12, Ver.3.0.x series versions prior to Ver.3.0.32, Ver.2.11.x series versions prior to Ver.2.11.61, Ver.2.10.x series versions prior to Ver.2.10.53, and Ver.2.9 and earlier versions. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with a contributor or higher privilege who can log in to the product may execute an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who accessed the website using the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-27279|2024-03-12T08:19:48.705Z -- appleple%20inc. -- a-blog%20cms%20ver.3.1.x%20series
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability exists in a-blog cms Ver.3.1.x series Ver.3.1.9 and earlier, Ver.3.0.x series Ver.3.0.30 and earlier, Ver.2.11.x series Ver.2.11.59 and earlier, Ver.2.10.x series Ver.2.10.51 and earlier, and Ver.2.9 and earlier versions. If this vulnerability is exploited, a user with editor or higher privilege who can login to the product may obtain arbitrary files on the server including password files.
